tool_description: Evaluates academic sources based on journal reputation, citation metrics, publication venue, and other quality indicators to assess research reliability.

title.description: Title of the source to evaluate

journal_name.description: Name of journal or publication venue

source_type.description: Type of source (journal, conference, preprint, book)

error_messages: Missing required fields: title, authors, journal_name, publication_year, and source_type are required.
Invalid publication year: Must be a valid year between 1900 and current year.
Invalid source type: Use journal, conference, preprint, or book.
Empty author list: At least one author must be provided.
Invalid citation count: Must be a non-negative integer.
usage: Provide title, authors, journal_name, publication_year, and source_type. Include optional fields like doi, citation_count, peer_reviewed status, research_field, and institution_affiliations for more comprehensive evaluation.

journal_reputation.description: Journal reputation level (high, medium, low, unknown)
